name: ip_to_location
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ip_to_location.
Tool description: 100% free to use. Get location details from IP address, endpoint returns coordinates [latitude, longitude], ip, isp, host[ ip_address, prefix len, status, country, region, city, location,area code, country code
API description: Retrieves location details based on the provided IP address using the RapidAPI service.

ip.description: The IP address for which to get location details. Defaults to '179.27.93.248'.
